name: Claw Core
description: Terminal Runtime Layer — session-managed command execution for AI agents. Auto-starts claw_core daemon, provides exec wrapper and skills. Linux and macOS only (Windows not supported). Daemon auto-downloads binary and installs skills on first start when OpenClaw does not run postinstall.

binaryPath.description: Path to claw_core binary. If unset, uses claw_core from PATH or ~/.cargo/bin/claw_core.

sourcePath.description: Path to claw repo (to build from source). If set, daemon uses cargo run from this dir.

autoStart.description: Auto-start claw_core when OpenClaw gateway starts
